title: Revenge of the backlog!!! (Plus, new TMNT) [The Resties]
description: To make room for the new games of the fall video game season, The Resties are clearing out their backlogs. Frushtick is finishing Dark Souls 2 on the Steam Deck. Plante sees Cult of the Lamb to its end. Plus, both Resties get nostalgic with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection.  As for the now customary movie recs? Well, it's the beginning of spooky seasons so we're tossing in an Alien AND a Predator.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Resties, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
